titles.title: When The Lord Shall Build Up Zion

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When the Lord shall build up Zion
He shall appear in His glory,
When the Lord shall build up Zion
In His glory He shall appear.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To hear the groaning of the prisoner,
To loose those appointed unto death,
To declare His name in Zion,
And His praise in Jerusalem.
